attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Path2Work has the simple aim of getting as many ex-offenders from the East of England as possible into sustainable employment.   The project was set up in October 2006 as a wholly-funded pathfinder project for the National Offender Management Service.  It is now also part-funded by each of the six Probation Areas that it serves: Bedfordshire, Hertfordshire, Cambridgeshire, Suffolk, Norfolk and Essex. Path2Work will closing on the 31st May 2009 because the National Offender Management Service will cease funding the project.
